name: GRIB2 Meteorological Data File
summary: Learn about .GRIB2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The GRIB2 format is an open standard used around the world to store and exchange meteorological data between computer systems. The format supercedes the GRIB format which uses the .GRB and .GRIB file extensions.

description: A GRIB2 file is a binary file saved in the World Meteorological Organization (WMO) format. It contains gridded meteorological data and is used by meterological centers to store and exchange gridded fields.
